channel.title: CVE Feed for Symantec Corporation -- Symantec Encryption Management Server (SEMS)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Symantec Corporation -- Symantec Encryption Management Server (SEMS)

item.title: CVE-2018-5243|2024-09-16T17:24:18.090Z -- symantec%20corporation -- symantec%20encryption%20management%20server%20%28sems%29
item.description: The Symantec Encryption Management Server (SEMS) product, prior to version 3.4.2 MP1, may be susceptible to a denial of service (DoS) exploit. A DoS attack is a type of attack whereby the perpetrator attempts to make a particular machine or network resource unavailable to its intended users by temporarily or indefinitely disrupting services of a specific host within a network.
